title: SSP Operations Shoaib boosts field vigilance through surprise inspections
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 02 (APP): Senior Superintendent of Police (SSP) Operations Muhammad Shoaib Khan visited multiple duty points across the federal capital to inspect police deployment and evaluate performance of officers on duty.

An official told APP on Sunday that the visit aimed to encourage deployed personnel and ensure effective policing across the city. Other senior officers also accompanied the SSP during the inspection.

The SSP Shoaib directed field officers to personally monitor duty points in their respective jurisdictions and perform their responsibilities with diligence, honesty, and professionalism.

“We are collectively responsible for protecting the lives and property of citizens. Effective presence in the field is key to maintaining peace,” he emphasized.

He instructed officers to adopt courteous and professional conduct while dealing with the public, adding that it is the responsibility of Islamabad Police to create a secure and friendly environment for residents.

SSP reaffirmed that crime prevention and the safety of citizens remain the foremost priorities of the force, and all measures will continue to ensure a peaceful capital.
